name: Battle within My Mind
description:
Battle within My Mind is my entry For Speedgame: Classic 2020

Bible text selected:

GENESIS 50:20

But as for you, ye thought evil against me; but God meant it unto good, to bring to pass, as it is this day, to save much people alive.

The Game represents some of the battles I had in my mind during the process of the birth of my 1st child, which was born a month premature, and the time shortly thereafter. From the before the birth, during the operation and the month in the NICU, up until the bringing of the baby home for the first time, just a few of the negative thoughts I personally had to battle against.

The best part about this testimony is how it was featured (moreso from my wife's point of view) in our local newspaper.

The article can be seen here:

https://www.cassville-democrat.com/story/2462940.html

Hope you enjoy it!

There seems to be a pause but not be able to unpause glitch on the ouya version after stage 3.
